item.description:
Stop by and join other Boston Young Professionals for a private early evening social happy hour.
We've reserved a private area for our members, so there will be no confusion as to who is with our group, where we're located, etc. We'll also have our own servers.

Expect to meet 30-50 people ages 23-45. Our events attract an ethnically diverse crowd of educated young professionals.



ADMISSION - PLEASE READ:
$5 in advance/$10 at the door
REGISTER HERE - http://bostonmoxieint...

ADMISSION COVERS:
*Food served from 7-8pm or until gone
*Semi-Private room exclusively for our members only (Ask for the back lounge)
*Event Host and team of 3 Greeters to help with making introductions and mingling
*Nametags
*Server gratuity



AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45

IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. We have a lot of men showing up at the door without RSVPing. In order for us to work to ensure an even gender ratio, we need to have an accurate idea of men and women attending.

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO RIPPED JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals



CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the semi-private back lounge - Look for the curtain!
item.name: Saturday Night Social
